resources.string: 1. The objective of this game is to you build your math skills.
2. The goal is to answer as many questions correctly as possible by the end of the game.
3. You will answer 10 questions throughout the game, which will be randomly generated.
4. For each question answered correctly, you will score 10 points. Incorrect answers get a penalty of 10 points.
5. You get to choose from 3 different sets of questions, which will have varying degrees of difficulty. Easy, medium, and hard are the difficulties you can choose from.

6. You will have a certain amount of time to answer each question. If you choose the easy set, you will have 60 seconds to answer. If you choose the medium set, you will have 45 seconds to answer. If you choose the hard set, you will have 45 seconds to answer.
7. If you fail to answer a question after the time limit, you will loose 20 points.
This is a question that acts as a place holder for this initial layout.
